request.description:
POST 3-5 rooms in each hotel with different price and
different category.

GET availability of room on some particular date
(Parameters)
POST Booked the room of hotel for particular date with (optional status)

response.name: Booking of room no 5 on 12-12-2020 confirmed
response.body: "Booking of room no 5 has been confirmed on 12-12-2020 12:00:00 AM with optional status"

request.description: PUT update booking date for any room by Id

response.name: Booking Date Changed
response.body: "Booking of room no 6 has been changed from 12-04-2020 12:00:00 AM to  with optional status"

request.description: PUT update booking status by booking Id (optional status to Definitive or Cancelled)

response.name: Booking Status changed to Definitive
response.body: "Status of Booking no 2 has been changed to Definitive"

request.description: DELETE delete booking by booking Id (change status Deleted ‚Äì soft delete)

response.name: Change status to deleted soft delete
response.body: "Status of Booking id 2 has been changed to deleted"
